name: Verify that users can successfully enter numbers in the 'Greater Than' field in the condition section

steps.name: Given I open a browser and open RBAC Login page
When I click on sign in RBAC link
Then I enter the username and password to RBAC as tlsapp
Given Click on Create a rule
When Input a number in the greater than field
Then Check whether the error is shown or not

fullName: UI test cases: Verify that users can successfully enter numbers in the 'Greater Than' field in the condition section
